text: int main ( ) { int count ; int data [ 101 ] = { 0 } ; int greater ; int greater_list [ 101 ] = { 0 } ; int sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & count ) ; while ( count ) { int tgl_length , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & tgl_length ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= tgl_length ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , ( data + j ) ) ; if ( * ( data + j ) > * ( data + j - 1 ) ) { greater_list [ i ] = * ( data + j ) ; } } } while ( i ) { sum += greater_list [ i -- ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; count -- ; sum = 0 ; tgl_length = 0 ; } }
